channel.title: audit on Drupal | IT Quicktasks
channel.description: Recent content in audit on Drupal | IT Quicktasks

item.title: Modules for Drupal Audit
item.description: The following modules are needed: drush en site_audit -y drush en hacked -y drush en diff -y drush en seo_checklist -y drush en security_review -y drush en unused_modules -y All of the resulting reports will be in Admin > Reports. Exception is “Unused Modules” where you need to go to Admin > Configuration > Development
